DOC.brief_title: New Disposable Contact Lens Patient Interface For The Lensx Laser
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single center clinical trial 300 consecutive eye subject schedule undergo ocular surgery require initial incision , specifically , cataract surgery . Subjects screen eligibility . Eligible subject examine preoperatively establish baseline ocular condition . Subjects undergo unilateral cataract surgery use LenSx Laser one combination follow laser procedure : anterior capsulotomy , laser lens phacofragmentation corneal incision implantation intraocular lens ( IOL ) . Surgeon staff comment solicit ergonomic packaging feature new disposable contact lens . Subjects evaluate intraoperatively assess comfort new disposable contact lens , well completion anterior capsulotomy , laser lens phacofragmentation completion corneal incision . All patient evaluate postoperatively one day , one week 1 month follow condition surgical eye . Further follow perform discretion surgeon .
